name: Everyday Tofu Stir Fry
description: Everyday Tofu Stir Fry is easy to make in one pan and ready in 20 minutes. Full of crispy tofu, fresh vegetables and the most delicious stir fry sauce ever!
recipeIngredient: 1 block  extra-firm tofu (16-oz), pressed (or get the high protein variety that isn't packed in water)
1 medium sweet onion, sliced or chopped
1 large red bell pepper, sliced or chopped
1/3 cup low sodium soy sauce (OR tamari for gluten free)
1/4 cup pure maple syrup or agave
2-3 cups cooked rice, white or brown
cashews, peanuts or sesame seeds, optional

recipeInstructions.text: Press the tofu: Wrap the block of tofu in paper towels. Place a plate or pan on top of the wrapped tofu, and put a couple of heavy books on top of that. Let the tofu press for 20-30 minutes. You can skip this step if you buy the high protein, super firm variety, which I recommend.
recipeInstructions.name: Press the tofu: Wrap the block of tofu in paper towels. Place a plate or pan on top of the wrapped tofu, and put a couple of heavy books on top of that. Let the tofu press for 20-30 minutes. You can skip this step if you buy the high protein, super firm variety, which I recommend.

recipeInstructions.text: After pressing the tofu, chop it into 1/2 inch cubes. Slice/chop the garlic, ginger, onion, red bell pepper, carrot and broccoli florets. In a bowl, whisk together the sauce ingredients. Have everything close to the stove and ready to go.
recipeInstructions.name: After pressing the tofu, chop it into 1/2 inch cubes. Slice/chop the garlic, ginger, onion, red bell pepper, carrot and broccoli florets. In a bowl, whisk together the sauce ingredients. Have everything close to the stove and ready to go.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan or wok, heat the sesame oil over medium-high heat. Add the tofu, and fry it for 5-10 minutes, until all sides are golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan or wok, heat the sesame oil over medium-high heat. Add the tofu, and fry it for 5-10 minutes, until all sides are golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: To the pan with the tofu, add the onion, garlic and ginger and stir for about 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: To the pan with the tofu, add the onion, garlic and ginger and stir for about 1 minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the red bell pepper, carrots and broccoli and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring constantly.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the red bell pepper, carrots and broccoli and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring constantly.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the stir fry sauce, stir and cook for 1-2 minutes. Serve immediately with chopped green onions, sesame seeds, cashew pieces or peanuts, if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour in the stir fry sauce, stir and cook for 1-2 minutes. Serve immediately with chopped green onions, sesame seeds, cashew pieces or peanuts, if desired.

keywords: tofu stir fry, vegan stir fry
